Miles Sound System SDK 6.1c

AIL_active_3D_sample_count

The function AIL_active_3D_sample_count returns the number of currently playing sample handles for the specified M3D provider.

S32 AIL_active_3D_sample_count(
  HPROVIDER m3d
);

In Parameters

m3d
indicates the M3D provider to query.


Group: 3D Digital Audio Services
Related Functions: AIL_start_3D_sample
Related Basic Types: HPROVIDER, S32
